string.value: The Brainy Boy swore that he would find more Loose-Leaf Pages from the Crying Girl's Sketchbook, including her drawing of a Robot. This sounds like something Andy mentioned. Perhaps you should tell him about this.
When Andy heard the story about the kids, said it was a useful piece of information and that you should prepare yourself for your next time travel.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 30,000\r\nCan participate in "Nex the Time Guard" quest.\r\n

I think she's disappointed because she didn't find all of the pages from her Sketchbook. She was so proud of her new robot drawing, too. Could you just keep an eye out for pieces of paper you might see lying around?
It really was an incredible drawing. I hope she isn't too bummed out about it, though I know she is.
I wasn't asking you to go out of your way to find them. I just thought you could keep an eye out for them in case you saw any. If you're too lazy to do that... Then...fine.
What is it?\r\n#b#L0#I think you should know something.#l\n#k
What? Did you learn something?\r\n#b#L0#I'm not sure, but I met a boy while I was investigating a little town during year 2016, and he mentioned something about a robot.#l\n#k
Is that so? Hmm.\r\n#b#L0#Yes, but the kids lost the drawing. I know it's just a child's scribbles, but I couldn't just ignore it.#l\n#k
I see. It really isn't anything definite. But I can't simply ignore it. either. Thank you. Nothing is for sure, but we may have found a clue.
Thanks. I think it's time you got ready for your next time travel. Let me know when you're prepared.
Where have all the grown-ups gone?
